#summary Check prohibit text from target files

=== Check environment from target files === 

The following configuration snippet would check environment-specific each build phase.

For example, there is 3 build phase likes "local", "devel", "releae".
Surely, you don't want your "local|devel" DB's IP in "release" build phase!

This goal will check to make sure "local|devel"'s specific strings not in "release" build phase.

{{{
  <build>
    <plugins>
      ...
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.openwebtop.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-precheck-plugin</artifactId>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <id>prohibittext</id>
            <phase>validate</phase>
            <goals>
              <goal>prohibittext</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
        <configuration>
          <prohibitText>
            <basedir>web</basedir>
            <includes>
              <include>**/**</include>
            </includes>
            <prohibitTextPatterns>
              <prohibitTextPattern>
                 <![CDATA[<img[^>]*src="http://localhost[^>]*>]]>
              </prohibitTextPattern>
              <prohibitTextPattern>
                <![CDATA[<script[^>]*src="http://localhost[^>]*]]>
              </prohibitTextPattern>
            </prohibitTextPatterns>
          </prohibitText>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
}}}
